flawed_nl_solution:
First find the total numbers of marbles: 14 + 20 + 19 + 7 = <<14+20+19+7=60>>60 marbles
After sharing them equally each person will get 60 marbles / 4 people = <<60/4=51>>51 marbles/person
#### 51

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
